attributes.action: To agree to end the school term on Friday 11th December 2020 at the latest.
attributes.additional_details: Because it needs to be national decision and to affect all schools in England for it to have the desired affect.
attributes.background: By closing schools earlier for the Christmas break, schools will have a longer break, as universities do, and this may act as a circuit breaker, reducing the spread of the virus. Also, this will prevent anyone who attends or works in a school having to isolate over Christmas.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015
